title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 53.16 - Violation of visiting rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 53.16 - Violation of visiting rules

State Regulations

Any person who may refuse to abide by any of the rules
concerning the method and manner of entering or leaving the institution shall
not be permitted to pass. The employee in charge of the entrance shall seize
and detain the person of anyone who shall violate, or attempt to violate any of
such rules and he shall immediately report such seizure to the
warden. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
53.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
